en: In Survival Mode, there will be an endless supply of ammunition and an endless horde of monsters. The monsters will gradually become stronger as time passes. Hold on until the end!
zh-CN: 生存模式中将有数不尽的弹药，同时会有有数不尽的怪物，怪物会随着时间推移逐渐变强，坚持到最后！

en: Please drag the attachments from the right sidebar and drop them here.
zh-CN: 请拖动右侧栏中的配件放入此处

en: The monsters will attack from random directions. Please hold on until the end of the round!
zh-CN: 怪物将从随机方向进攻，请坚持到回合结束！

en: The game is about to begin!
Would you like to purchase a weapon:
Would you like to purchase accessories:
Right-click to launch a grenade, causing area-of-effect (AOE) damage. Cooldown: 3 seconds.
zh-CN: 按下右键会向鼠标瞄准处发射一枚榴弹，造成AOE伤害，冷却3秒

换弹速度+20%
弹夹容量+10

弹夹容量+5
换弹速度+20%

en: There is a 15% chance to reduce incoming damage.
zh-CN: 有15%的概率减少受到伤害

en: There is a 10% chance to deal double damage.
zh-CN: 有10%的概率造成双倍伤害

en: Increase player's movement speed by 5 points.
Hitting an enemy adds a mark. When the number of marks reaches 3, it will explode and deal 5 points of damage.
zh-CN: 击中敌人会添加一次标记，当标记数量达到3个时会爆炸造成5点伤害

en: There is a chance to drop a health pack after killing a monster, restoring 1 point of health.
zh-CN: 击杀怪物后有概率掉落医疗包，回复1点生命值

en: Killing 3 enemies within 1 second will trigger a frenzy state, reducing weapon attack cooldown by 10% for 2 seconds
zh-CN: 1秒内击杀3名敌人会进入狂热状态，武器攻击间隔减少10%，持续2秒

en: Every 3 seconds, the next attack will deal 150% damage.
zh-CN: 每隔3秒，下一次攻击会造成150%的伤害

en: Each time you kill an enemy, it will provide an increase of 0.1 maximum health points (up to a maximum of 100) that can be held as an item.
zh-CN: 每次击杀一个敌人会提供0.1点生命值上限（上限为100，最多持有一个物品）

en: There is a chance to deliver an electric shock when hitting an enemy, dealing an additional 25% damage.
zh-CN: 命中敌人有概率造成一次电击，额外获得造成25%的伤害

en: Base firing rate of all firearms increased by 10% (stackable up to 10 layers)
zh-CN: 所有枪械基础射速提高10%（最高叠加10层）

en: Increase the base damage of all your firearms by 10% (stackable up to a maximum of 20 layers)
zh-CN: 使你的所有枪械基础伤害提高10%（最高叠加20层）

en: Increase reload speed of all firearms by 5% (stackable up to a maximum of 10 layers)
zh-CN: 所有枪械换弹速度提高5%（最高叠加10层）

en: Firearm damage has a 10% chance to deal 150% damage (stackable up to 10 layers, with 100% chance)
zh-CN: 枪械伤害有10%的概率造成150%的伤害（最高叠加10层，100%的概率）
